question: Comet Hale-Bopp orbits the sun every 50 years. Eric's dad saw the Comet when he was 27 years old. Eric saw the comet a second time when he was two times the age his dad was when he saw the Comet. How old was Eric when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Eric saw the Comet for the second time when he was 27 years * 2= <<27*2=54>>54 years old.
Comet Hale-Bopp can be seen every 50 years, so Eric saw the comet for the first time when he was 54 years - 50 years = <<54-50=4>>4 years old.
#### 4
